Container.Name: EnvelopeBudget
Container.Overview: Self-hosted envelope budgeting with reset/rollover funding, monthly auto-sync, and a modern HTMX UI. SQLite-backed and privacy-first.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: The port for the Flask/Gunicorn web server.

Config.Name: App Data Storage
Config.Description: Location for the budget.db SQLite file.

Config.Name: App Password Hash
Config.Description: The hashed password for login. Generate via 'budget-cli password hash'.

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: Flask secret key for session signing.

Container.Description: A lightweight envelope budgeting app designed for month-to-month clarity. - Dual funding modes: Reset (fixed bills) and Rollover (sinking funds). - Automatic monthly sync when you come back after gaps. - HTMX + Alpine.js UI with Flask and SQLAlchemy. - Self-hosted with SQLite for privacy.
